Package student.model.Booking

Class CarBookingService

java.lang.Object
student.model.Booking.CarBookingService
public class CarBookingService extends Object
Service class to handle car booking logic.

Provides methods for booking, cancellation, and availability checking by interacting with both CarBookingRepository and CarService.

  • Method Details

    • bookCar

      public UUID bookCar(User user, String regNumber)
      Books a car for a given user by registration number.

      It first fetches a list of all currently available cars, then checks if the given registration number matches one of them. If so, it creates a new CarBooking and saves it.

      Parameters:
      user - The user who wants to book the car
      regNumber - The car's registration number
      Returns:
      The unique booking ID if booking is successful
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the car is already booked or not available

    • getUserBookedCars

      public List<Car> getUserBookedCars(UUID userId)
      Retrieves a list of cars booked by a specific user (that are not canceled).
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user
      Returns:
      A list of cars the user has booked and not canceled

    • getAvailableCars

      public List<Car> getAvailableCars()
      Returns all currently available (not booked) cars.
      Returns:
      A list of all available cars

    • getAvailableElectricCars

      public List<Car> getAvailableElectricCars()
      Returns all available electric cars (i.e., not booked and is electric).
      Returns:
      A list of available electric cars

    • getBookings

      public List<CarBooking> getBookings()
      Returns all car bookings in the system (including canceled ones).
      Returns:
      A list of all car bookings

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(UUID bookingId)
      Cancels a car booking identified by its unique booking ID.

      This method first looks up the booking. If the booking is found and not yet canceled, it calls carBookingRepository.cancelCarBooking(bookingId) to finalize the cancellation. If the booking is already canceled, or not found at all, an exception is thrown.

      Parameters:
      bookingId - The unique booking ID to cancel
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If booking is already canceled or not found
